About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

INTRO

Hi! I am Amina BOURSSIA, not as freshly master degrees graduate as one would hope. Just trying to get on my feet again by coding this website. Please don't judge me until you've finished reading.
I tend to make jokes when uncomfortable. But I am a pretty serious person and a very hard working.
My university studies allowed me to acquire a solid general knowledge in the field of computer science, information system, database, and especially in the development.
Here, you are gonna find my resumé and some works done by me. I did all this for fun, imagine what I would do for money.
Enjoy the stay!
